name: Hats in the Deep
description:
Hats in the Deep

Descend into the dungeon, finding hats and defeating hat hording monsters. Can you prevail?

Keys: Arrows to move, [Z] to enter/select, [X] for action/back

by @selfsame and @eq

made for https://itch.io/jam/lisp-game-jam-2019

source at https://notabug.org/selfsame/aaa
